google/gvisor

Sandbox for containers that runs Linux system calls in userspace, sits between apps and the host kernel

Related repos

  • system container and virtual machine manager for Linux containers and VMs
  • Open-source container runtime that manages container lifecycle
  • Run Docker containers and Linux VMs with low resource use and fast startup
  • Creates sandboxes for Linux with host isolation
  • Tool for running Linux containers with lightweight virtual machines on Mac using Swift
  • Swift package for running Linux containers on macOS using lightweight virtual machines
  • workload orchestrator for containers, VMs, and legacy apps across clouds
  • Monitoring agent for servers, containers, and applications
  • tracks container resource usage and performance
